content: What's the best way to flag something for the Bug Squad? Just post a note here (or in Gitter)? Pun intended since the 'flag' module is the reason I'm asking...

See https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/flag/issues/17 and https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/flag/issues/10#issuecomment-577989696

Push a release for this module · Issue #17 · backdrop-contrib/flag
I just installed this module and it got a number of errors. Recognizing that the only release was almost 4 years ago and that numerous commits have been made since then, I tried the DEV release and...
Flag stdClass items causing problems on node save · Issue #10 · backdrop-contrib/flag
I'm getting an error related to Flag(ings?)s being stdClass objects instead of proper Entities. I'm going to take a stab at fixing this one... TypeError: Argument 1 passed to filter_entity_...
@Laryn Probably best to tag one of the members too: https://backdropcms.org/leadership/bug-squad
